title: Root's death (S05E10 Person of Interest)
author: Rick Sánchez
comment: Pay close attention in the part with the SUV before this and you'll see that Machine Gun Guy, the one who Root blew the hood of his SUV in his face and then caused to crash in a fiery explosion was Elias' killer. So Root avenged Elias shortly before being killed herself.

I think Root knew she wasn't going to make it. The way she was talking, especially that line "when the time comes you'll know what to do" sounds to me like she didn't expect to be there for that part.
She protected him for as long as she could
description: I obviously do not own any of this.
